Class Album

java.lang.Object
model.Album
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Album extends Object implements Serializable
Album holds photos in a list order.

Provides methods to add/remove photos and to query date ranges.

Album model representing a named collection of photos.

Provides operations to add/remove photos and to query album metadata such as size and date range.

Author:
Prayrit
See Also:

      Parameters:

    • getPhotos

      public List<Photo> getPhotos()
      Direct (modifiable) list of photos in the album. Prefer getPhotosUnmodifiable() when exposing externally.
      Returns:
      list of photos

    • addPhoto

      public boolean addPhoto(Photo p)
      Add a photo to the album if it is not already present.
      Parameters:
      p - photo to add
      Returns:
      true if added, false if already present

    • removePhoto

      public boolean removePhoto(Photo p)
      Remove a photo from the album.
      Parameters:
      p - photo to remove
      Returns:
      true if removed

    • size

      public int size()
      Number of photos in the album.
      Returns:
      count of photos

    • getStartDate

      public LocalDateTime getStartDate()
      Earliest photo date in the album, or null if none.
      Returns:
      earliest LocalDateTime or null

    • getEndDate

      public LocalDateTime getEndDate()
      Latest photo date in the album, or null if none.
      Returns:
      latest LocalDateTime or null

    • getPhotosUnmodifiable

      public List<Photo> getPhotosUnmodifiable()
      Unmodifiable view of the photos list.

      unmodifiable list of photos
